summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 12, Brooklyn Addition, being the alley between University Way and 15th Avenue Northeast, from East 42nd Street to East 43rd Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 105606 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
